long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever wanted to watch a movie and search through Netflix only to find out it's not available in the platform, then search once again in Disney+, and again on HBO, and so forth on multiple streaming platforms. This extension that allows a minimal search of movies / tv shows available to your region and show you which streaming platform you can watch the show.
